ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Red Hat Virtualization 4

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package grub2 is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package grub2-common is installed.

ns0:criterion.comment: Test if OPAL is not used

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Package providing /etc/login.defs is installed
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if package providing /etc/login.defs and is installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the system doesn't act as an oVirt host or manager
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if the system has neither ovirt-host nor ovirt-engine installed.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the system acts as an oVirt host or manager
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if the system has ovirt-host or ovirt-engine installed

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: WiFi interface is present
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if any wifi interface is present.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the scan target is a container
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check for presence of files characterizing container filesystems.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check if the scan target is a machine
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check for absence of files characterizing container filesystems.

ns0:extend_definition.comment: If environment is not a container, it is machine

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: System runs on UEK kernel
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if System is running on UEK kernel.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Kerberos server is older than 1.17-18
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if version of Kerberos server is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:criteria.comment: Kerberos server version is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if version of Kerberos server is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Kerberos workstation is older than 1.17-18
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if version of Kerberos workstation is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:criteria.comment: Kerberos workstation version is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:criterion.comment: Check if version of Kerberos workstation is lesser than 1.17-18

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Remote NFS file system mount is defined
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: At least one remote NFS file system mount is defined in /etc/fstab

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test that the architecture is aarch64
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is aarch64

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for different architecture than aarch64
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not aarch64

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test for different architecture than s390x
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test that the architecture is ppc64le
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is ppc64le

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test that the architecture is s390x
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is s390x

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Test that the architecture is x86_64
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is x86_64

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Running kernel has fips mode enabled
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if sysctl crypto.fips_enabled = 1

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Secure Boot status check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if System has Secure Boot enabled.

ns0:extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is UEFI

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: SELinux status check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if System has SELinux enabled.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

ns0:criterion.comment: Identification provider is set to ldap within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

ns0:extend_definition.comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: UEFI system boot mode check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check pam_faillock Existence in system-auth
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that pam_faillock.so exists in system-auth

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Check pam_pwquality Existence in system-auth
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check that pam_pwquality.so exists in system-auth

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Any Attempts to Run semanage
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Test if auditctl is in use for audit rules.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Any Attempts to Run semanage
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Test if augenrules is enabled for audit rules.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Events that Modify the System's Network Environment
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Record Events that Modify the System's Network Environment
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: 'log_file' Not Set In /etc/audit/auditd.conf
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Verify 'log_file' is not set in /etc/audit/auditd.conf.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: 'log_group' Not Set To 'root' In /etc/audit/auditd.conf
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Verify 'log_group' is not set to 'root' in /etc/audit/auditd.conf.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Verify GRUB_DISABLE_RECOVERY Set to true
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: GRUB_DISABLE_RECOVERY set to 'true' in /etc/default/grub

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Specify Multiple Remote chronyd NTP Servers for Time Data
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Multiple chronyd NTP Servers for time synchronization should be specified.

ns0:criteria.comment: chrony.conf conditions are met

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT existance check
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Check if GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT exists in /etc/default/grub.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: Use $kernelopts in /boot/loader/entries/*.conf
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Ensure that grubenv-defined kernel options are referenced in individual boot loader entries

ns0:criterion.comment: check kernel command line parameters for referenced boot entries reference the $kernelopts variable.

ns0:metadata.ns0:description: Checks if system uses zIPL bootloader.

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: The firewalld is disabled on the system
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The firewalld service should be disabled.

ns0:criteria.comment: package firewalld removed or service firewalld is not configured to start
service firewalld is not configured to start

ns0:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service firewalld is masked

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: The iptables is disabled on the system
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The iptables service should be disabled.

ns0:criteria.comment: package iptables removed or service iptables is not configured to start
service iptables is not configured to start

ns0:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service iptables is masked

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: The nftables is disabled on the system
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The nftables service should be disabled.

ns0:criteria.comment: package nftables removed or service nftables is not configured to start
service nftables is not configured to start

ns0:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service nftables is masked

ns0:metadata.ns0:title: The ufw is disabled on the system
ns0:metadata.ns0:description: The ufw service should be disabled.

ns0:criteria.comment: package ufw removed or service ufw is not configured to start
service ufw is not configured to start

ns0:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service ufw is masked

ns3:rpminfo_test.comment: system has package shadow-utils installed, which provides the /etc/login.defs file.
Kerberos server version is lesser than 1.17-18
Kerberos workstation version is lesser than 1.17-18

ns4:textfilecontent54_test.comment: at least one nfs is defined

ns5:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter crypto.fips_enabled set to 1

ns4:textfilecontent54_test.comment: SSSD Configuration is set to use LDAP
Ensure more than one chronyd NTP server is set
check kernel command line parameters for referenced boot entries reference the $kernelopts variable.
CPE vendor is 'fedoraproject' and 'product' is fedora

ns4:family_test.comment: Test installed OS is part of the unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family

ns4:environmentvariable58_test.comment: environment variable container is set to bwrap-osbuild

ns5:file_test.comment: Check if expected removable partitions truly exist on the system

ns4:variable_test.comment: Verify if Profile set Value sshd_required as not required
Verify if Profile set Value sshd_required as required
Verify if Value of sshd_required is the default

ns4:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Check the usbguard rules in either /etc/usbguard/rules.conf or /etc/usbguard/rules.d/ contain at least one non whitespace character and exists

ns4:variable_test.comment: Verify the existence of var_accounts_user_umask_as_number variable
Check if removable partition variable value represents CD/DVD drive
Verify the existence of var_umask_for_daemons_as_number variable

ns4:textfilecontent54_test.comment: VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 8.7
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 9.0
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 8.7
VERSION_ID in os-release is greater than or equal 9.0
VERSION_ID in os-release is less than or equal 8.4
VERSION_ID in os-release is not equal 9.0

ns3:systemdunitproperty_test.comment: Test that the firewalld service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service firewalld is masked
Test that the iptables service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service iptables is masked
Test that the nftables service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service nftables is masked
Test that the ufw service is not running
Test that the property LoadState from the service ufw is masked

ns4:textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure more than one chronyd NTP server is set

ns3:systemdunitproperty_object.comment: Retrieve the ActiveState property of firewalld
Retrieve the LoadState property of firewalld
Retrieve the ActiveState property of iptables
Retrieve the LoadState property of iptables
Retrieve the ActiveState property of nftables
Retrieve the LoadState property of nftables
Retrieve the ActiveState property of ufw
Retrieve the LoadState property of ufw

ns0:external_variable.comment: May be defined by Profiles to explicitly say if sshd is required or not
Value of var_accounts_user_umask (the required umask) as string

ns0:local_variable.comment: First octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
Second octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
Third octal digit of umask from var_accounts_user_umask
var_accounts_user_umask umask converted from string to a number

ns0:external_variable.comment: Value of var_umask_for_daemons (the required umask) as string

ns0:local_variable.comment: First octal digit of umask from var_umask_for_daemons
Second octal digit of umask from var_umask_for_daemons
Third octal digit of umask from var_umask_for_daemons
var_umask_for_daemons umask converted from string to a number
